description.EN: Your gas stations are always opened - 24/7.
description.ES: Your gas stations are always opened.
description.FR: Vos stations service sont toujours ouvertes.
description.DE: Ihre Tankstellen sind immer geöffnet.
description.IT: Le tue stazioni di servizio sono sempre aperte.

description.EN: Everything a driver may need: from sun glasses to deodorant.
description.ES: Everything a driver my need, from goggles to deodorants.
description.FR: Tout ce dont peut avoir besoin un automobiliste, des lunettes au désodorisant.
description.DE: Alles was ein Autofahrer braucht: von der Brille bis zum Deo.
description.IT: Tutto ciò di cui un automobilista può avere bisogno, dagli occhiali protettivi ai deodoranti.

description.EN: Worried by the increasing popularity of electric cars, you launch a campaign underlining how much less powerful their engine's are. Ecologists are not happy about this.
description.ES: Worried by the increasing popularity of electric car, you launch a campaign underlining the less power of electric engine. It doesn't go too god with echologists.
description.FR: Inquiets par la croissante popularité des voitures électriques, vous lancez une campagne mettant en avant le manque de puissance des moteurs électriques.
description.DE: Beunruhigt über die steigende Popularität von Elektroautos starten Sie eine Kampagne, die auf die geringe Power der Autos hinweist. Kein großer Hit bei den Grünen.
description.IT: Preoccupato dalla crescente popolarità delle auto elettriche, lanci una campagna che si concentra sulla minore potenza dei loro motori. Gli ecologisti non la prendono troppo bene.

description.EN: Your workers only wear asbestos clothes when in the plant's high temperature environments. It makes them a little clumsier but their overall safety is extremely improved.
description.ES: Your workers wear only asbestos clothes in the high temperature environment of the plant. It make them a little clumsier but the overall security is higly improved.
description.FR: Vos employés portent uniquement des vêtements en amiante à cause des fortes températures qui règnent sur la planète. Ces vêtements les rendent un peu maladroits, mais la sécurité est améliorée.
description.DE: Ihre Arbeiter tragen nur Asbestkleidung in der hocherhitzten Atmosphäre der Fabrik. Sie werden dadurch etwas behindert, aber die allgemeine Sicherheit ist wesentlich verbessert.
description.IT: I tuoi operai indossano solo indumenti in amianto all'interno dello stabilimento, dove le temperature sono molto alte. Ciò li rende un po' goffi ma migliora in maniera notevole la sicurezza.

description.EN: Special pumps that periodically clean themselves.
description.ES: Special pumps that periodically clean themselves.
description.FR: Pompes spéciales qui se nettoient automatiquement de manière régulière.
description.DE: Spezialpumpen, die sich regelmäßig selbst reinigen.
description.IT: Speciali pompe che si puliscono da sole periodicamente.

name.FR: Paiement automatique par lecture de la plaque
name.IT: Pagamento automatico in base alla targa

description.EN: A device reads car's license plates when at that pump and automatically charges the owner's credit card: quick and efficient.
description.ES: A device read the plate of the car that is being refilled and charge automatically the owner credit card. Quick and efficient.
description.FR: Un dispositif lit la plaque d'immatriculation qui effectue le plein et débite automatique la carte de crédit du client. Rapide et efficace.
description.DE: Ein Gerät liest während des Tankens das Nummernschild und bucht den Betrag automatisch von Konto des Benutzers ab. Schnell und effizient.
description.IT: Un apparecchio legge il numero di targa dell'auto che sta facendo rifornimento e addebita automaticamente la spesa alla carte di credito del proprietario. Un metodo rapido ed efficace.

description.EN: Implement a bacteria purification system in the event your suppliers have researched "Impurity Eating Bacteria". Removing the bacteria improves gas's quality.
description.ES: Implement a bacteria purification system in case your suppliers have researched "Impurity Eating Bacteria". Removing them improve the quality of the gas.
description.FR: Met en uvre un système de purification anti-bactérienne si vos fournisseurs ont fait la recherche sur la « bactérie mangeuse d'impuretés ». L'éradication des impuretés améliore la qualité du carburant.
description.DE: Setzen Sie ein Bakterienreinigungssystem ein, wenn Ihre Zulieferer Unreinheiten essenden Bakterien entwickelt haben. Ihre Entfernung verbessert die Qualität des Benzins.
description.IT: Implementi un sistema di depurazione antibatterico in caso i tuoi fornitori abbiano sviluppato "Batteri contro le impurità". La rimozione di questi batteri migliora la qualità del petrolio.

description.EN: You mix a special cleaner with your fuel, so that when it circulates through the car, it keeps all the engine parts clean. Drivers like it a lot.
description.ES: You mix a special cleaner to your fuel, so that while circulating in the car, it keeps all the parts of the engine clean. Drivers like it a lot.
description.FR: Vous mélangez un nettoyant spécial à votre carburant qui fait que, lorsque vous utilisez votre voiture, toutes les parties du moteur restent propres. Les automobilistes l'adorent.
description.DE: Sie können eine besondere Reinigungssubstanz in Ihr Benzin geben. Wenn Sie dann mit dem Auto fahren, reinigt es alle Teile des Motors. Autofahrer sind begeistert.
description.IT: Mescoli al tuo carburante uno speciale detergente che, una volta entrato in circolo, mantiene pulite le parti del motore. Un'innovazione molto apprezzata dagli automobilisti.

description.EN: Your stations have a car washing facility.
description.ES: Your stations have a car washing facility.
description.FR: Vos stations sont équipées d'un centre de lavage pour voitures.
description.DE: Ihre Tankstellen verfügen über eine Waschstraße.
description.IT: Le tue stazioni di servizio sono dotate di autolavaggio.

description.EN: Your chimneys emit colored smoke. It looks nicer and you can discharge more claiming that the color only makes it seem like more. Some environmentalists think the color increases pollution.
description.ES: Your plants chimneys emit colored smoke. It is nicer to see and you can discharge more volume claiming that it seems more because of the colour, Some think that add pollution.
description.FR: Les cheminées de vos usines émettent des fumées de couleur. Ceci est plus agréable à voir et vous pouvez émettre en plus grande quantité en disant qu'il paraît y en avoir plus à cause de la couleur. Certaines personnes pensent que cela augmente la pollution.
description.DE: Aus den Schornsteinen Ihrer Fabriken kommt bunter Rauch. Es sieht hübscher aus und sie können mehr ausstoßen, da Sie behaupten es sähe nur auf Grunde der Farbe nach mehr aus. Einige sagen, es ist zusätzliche Umweltverschmutzung.
description.IT: Le ciminiere dei tuoi stabilimenti emettono fumo colorato. Esso ha un aspetto migliore e puoi scaricarne di più, con la scusa che sia il colore a farlo sembrare tanto. Alcuni pensano inquini.

name.FR: Mélange automatique de pétrole non raffiné

description.EN: Computer controlled mixing of the crude oil received from the different suppliers.
description.ES: Computer controlled mixing of the crude oil coming from different suppliers.
description.FR: Mélange de pétrole non raffiné provenant de différents fournisseurs et contrôlé par ordinateur.
description.DE: Computergesteuerte Mischung der Rohöle verschiedener Zulieferer.
description.IT: Miscelazione gestita da un computer del petrolio greggio proveniente da fornitori diversi.

description.EN: No need to periodically shut down your plants to clean their filters. With two filtration systems for each chimney, you only need to rotate them for cleaning, instead stopping production.
description.ES: Instead of periodically shutting down the plants to clean the depurators, you have two of them for each chimney and you just rotate them without stopping the production.
description.FR: Au lieu de fermer régulièrement des usines pour nettoyer les épurateurs, vous en disposez de deux dans chaque cheminée. Il vous suffit de les faire pivoter sans être obligé d'arrêter la production.
description.DE: Anstatt die Fabriken periodisch zu schließen, um die Filtermaschinen zu säubern, haben Sie an jedem Schornstein zwei davon, die abwechselnd benutzt werden ohne die Produktion zu stoppen.
description.IT: Invece di chiudere periodicamente gli stabilimenti per pulire i depuratori, ne installi due per ogni ciminiera in modo da poterli alternare senza bloccare la produzione.

description.EN: To diversify your offering, you produce this cheaper combustible.
description.ES: To diversify your offer, you produce this cheaper combustible.
description.FR: Pour diversifier votre offre, vous produisez ce combustible peu onéreux.
description.DE: Sie produzieren diesen billigen Kraftstoff, um Ihr Angebot zu vergrößern.
description.IT: Per diversificare la tua offerta produci anche questo carburante meno costoso.

description.EN: At your stations a computerized machine informs customers of the best route to take and the weather conditions they will encounter.
description.ES: In your stations a computerized machines informs your clients about the best route to take and the conditions of the weather on the way.
description.FR: Dans vos stations, des ordinateurs informent vos clients du meilleur itinéraire à emprunter et des conditions météorologiques sur le trajet.
description.DE: In Ihren Tankstellen informieren Computer die Kunden über die beste Strecke zu ihrem Ziel und über die Wetterbedingungen unterwegs.
description.IT: Le tue stazioni di servizio sono dotate di computer che danno informazioni ai clienti sul tragitto da compiere per raggiungere la loro meta e sul tempo previsto.

name.IT: Divieto di avere con sé oggetti infiammabili

description.EN: You forbid your employees from bringing any flammable items into the plant, clothes included. It's an appreciated security measure.
description.ES: You forbid your emplyoees to bring at the plant any flammable item, clothes included. It's an appreciated security measure.
description.FR: Vous interdisez à vos employés d'amener des objets inflammables à l'usine, y compris des vêtements. C'est une mesure de sécurité appréciée.
description.DE: Sie verbieten Ihren Angestellten irgendwelchen brennbaren Gegenstände, Kleidung eingeschlossen, mit in die Fabrik zu bringen. Eine sehr beliebte Sicherheitsmaßnahme.
description.IT: Vieti ai tuoi impiegati di portare allo stabilimento oggetti infiammabili, compresi i vestiti. Decisione apprezzata come misura di sicurezza.

description.EN: With a large gas purchase you are offered a free oil change.
description.ES: With a big gas purchase you offer free oil change if the car needs it.
description.FR: Lorsque vous achetez une grande quantité de carburant, une vidange gratuite est effectuée si cela est nécessaire.
description.DE: Bei einem großen Einkauf von Benzin bieten Sie einen Ölwechsel gratis an.
description.IT: Offri un cambio d'olio gratis (se la sua vettura ne ha bisogno) a chi acquista una determinata quantità di carburante.

description.EN: Why burn wood when you can have a very efficient fireplace that uses a specially made gas: a great new line of business for your company.
description.ES: Why burn wood when you can have a very efficient fireplace that consumes a specially made gas? A new line of business for your company.
description.FR: Pourquoi brûler du bois lorsque vous disposez d'une cheminée efficace qui une variété d'essence spéciale ? Nouvelle activité pour votre société.
description.DE: Warum Holz verbrennen, wenn Sie einen Kamin haben können der speziell hergestelltes Gas verbrennt? Eine neue Idee für Ihr Geschäft.
description.IT: Perché bruciare legna quando puoi dotarti di un efficiente caminetto a gas? Una nuova attività commerciale per la tua azienda.

description.EN: Since your station is always open, you force your employees to work long shifts in order to save money.
description.ES: Since your stations are always open, to save money you impose long shifts on your workers.
description.FR: Etant donné que vos stations sont toujours ouvertes, vous économisez de l'argent en imposant de longues périodes de travail à vos employés.
description.DE: Da Ihre Tankstellen immer geöffnet sind, zwingen Sie Ihre Arbeiter zu langen Schichten, um Geld zu sparen.
description.IT: Dal momento che le tue stazioni di servizio sono sempre aperte, per risparmiare denaro imponi lunghi turni di lavoro ai tuoi dipendenti.

description.EN: Your plants produce three different kind of gas with different octane concentrations. Your customers can choose depending on how much power they want for their cars.
description.ES: Your plants produce three differents kind of gas with different octane concentrations. Your customers can choose depending on the power they want for their cars.
description.FR: Vos usines produisent trois types de carburants ayant une concentration d'octane différente. Vos clients peuvent choisir en fonction de la motorisation de leur voiture.
description.DE: Ihre Fabriken produzieren verschiedenen Benzinsorten mit unterschiedlichen Oktanzahlen. So können die Kunden je nach Wunsch frei wählen.
description.IT: I tuoi impianti producono tre tipi di benzina con differenti concentrazioni di ottani. I clienti possono scegliere la miscela a seconda della potenza che desiderano per la loro auto.

description.EN: Your company offers a monthly pump cleaning and tuning service to stations that purchase their gas: avoids leaks and impurity.
description.ES: Your company offers to the Gas Stations who buys from them a service of pumps cleaning and tuning every month to avoid any leaking and impurity.
description.FR: Votre société propose aux stations d'essence qui lui achètent du carburant, un service de nettoyage des pompes et de réglage mensuel afin d'éviter toute fuite et impuretés.
description.DE: Ihr Unternehmen bietet den Tankstellen, die von ihnen einkaufen einmal im Monat ein Reinigungs- und Einstellservice zur Vermeidung von Unreinheiten und Lecks.
description.IT: La tua azienda offre alle stazioni di servizio che acquistano le sue pompe di benzina un servizio di pulizia e taratura mensile. Esso previene il rischio di perdite ed elimina le scorie.

name.FR: Etude sur la concentration en oxygène

description.EN: Since the oxygen concentration in the extraterrestrial worlds' air is slightly different from the Earth's, you need to alter your gas manufacturing in order to obtain perfect combustion.
description.ES: Since the oxygen concentration in air in the extraterrestrial worlds is slightly different from the Earth one, to obtain a perfect combustion you need to alter the manifacturing of your gas.
description.FR: Etant donné que la concentration en oxygène de l'air des mondes extraterrestres est légèrement différente de celle de la Terre, vous devez modifier la fabrication de votre gaz pour obtenir une combustion parfaite.
description.DE: Da die Sauerstoffkonzentration in der Luft der außerirdischen Welten leicht von derjenigen der Erde abweicht, müssen Sie zum Erreichen einer perfekten Verbrennung die Herstellung Ihres Benzins ändern.
description.IT: Dal momento che la concentrazione di ossigeno nell'aria è lievemente diversa sui mondi extraterrestri, per ottenere una perfetta combustione devi modificare le caratteristiche del carburante.

description.EN: For race fanatics, your stations offer a "race-like-stop": a team takes over and quickly refuels your car, rotates your tires and checks their pressure. You feel like a race car driver.
description.ES: For race fanatics, your stations offer a race like stop, with quick fuel refilling, tires rotation and pressure control.
description.FR: Pour les fanatiques de course automobile, vos stations proposent un arrêt comme dans les courses avec plein rapide, rotation des pneumatiques et contrôle de la pression.
description.DE: Für Rennsportfreaks bieten Ihre Tankstellen einen Boxenstopp mit schneller Benzinzufuhr, Reifenwechsel und Druckkontrolle.
description.IT: Per i fanatici dell'automobilismo, le tue stazioni di servizio offrono veri e propri pit stop, con rifornimento, rotazione dei pneumatici e controllo della pressione.

name.FR: Stratégie marketing en fonction des plaques d'immatriculation
name.IT: Strategia di marketing basata sulle targhe

description.EN: From the plates you are able to get information about your customers and can implement a marketing strategy directed precisely to them.
description.ES: From the plates you can get informations on your clients and implement a marketing strategy directed precisely on them.
description.FR: A partir des plaques d'immatriculation, vous pouvez obtenir des informations sur vos clients et mettre en uvre une stratégie marketing ciblée.
description.DE: Die Nummernschilder geben Ihnen Informationen über Ihre Kunden und so können Sie darauf eine gezielte Marketingstrategie aufbauen
description.IT: Le targhe delle auto ti permettono di ottenere informazioni sui clienti e sviluppare una precisa strategia di marketing.

description.EN: For your regular customers. Every time they purchase gas, they accumulate points that can be used towards free gifts.
description.ES: For your habitual customers. Every time they purchase gas, they accumulate points to receive free gifts.
description.FR: Pour vos clients habituels. Chaque fois qu'il achètent du carburant, ils accumulent des points et reçoivent des cadeaux.
description.DE: Für Ihre Stammkunden. Jedes Mal, wenn Sie Benzin kaufen, sammeln sie Punkte für Geschenke.
description.IT: Permette ai clienti abituali di accumulare punti ad ogni rifornimento e ricevere in cambio regali.

description.EN: Learn how to refine oil and produce gasoline.
description.ES: Learn how to refine oil and produce gasoline.
description.FR: Apprenez à raffiner le pétrole et à produire de l'essence.
description.DE: Lernen Sie, wie Öl raffiniert wird und Benzin entsteht.
description.IT: Apprendi i metodi di raffinamento del greggio al fine di produrre benzina.

description.EN: You have a mechanic at every station.
description.ES: You have a mechanic in every station.
description.FR: Vous disposez d'un mécanicien dans chaque station service.
description.DE: In jeder Tankstelle steht ein Mechaniker zur Verfügung.
description.IT: Ogni stazione di servizio è dotata di meccanico.

name.FR: Production de carburant pour avions à réaction
name.IT: Produzione di carburante per aerei e astronavi

description.EN: You provide fuel for planes and, to help stimulate the space ship industry, high powered rocket fuel.
description.ES: You provide fuel for planes and, to help the raising space ship industry, high powered rocket fuel.
description.FR: Vous fournissez du carburant pour l'aviation et, afin d'aider la toute nouvelle industrie de l'aviation spatiale, du carburant puissant pour fusées.
description.DE: Sie bieten Treibstoffe für Flugzeuge an, und, um die Raumfahrt zu unterstützen, auch für Raketen.
description.IT: Produci carburante per l'industria aeronautica e una miscela ad altissima potenza per i reattori utilizzati nell'industria aerospaziale, in continua espansione.

description.EN: Self service only at your pumps.
description.ES: Self service only at your pumps.
description.FR: Les clients se servent eux-mêmes à la pompe.
description.DE: An Ihren Tankstellen gibt es nur Selbstbedienung.
description.IT: Le tue pompe di benzina sono solo self-service.

description.EN: You provide emergency assistance with towing and repair service.
description.ES: Emergency assistance with towing and repairment service.
description.FR: Aide d'urgence avec service de remorquage et de réparation.
description.DE: Pannenhilfe mit Abschleppwagen und Reparaturservice.
description.IT: Un servizio di assistenza per il traino delle automobili e le riparazioni.

description.EN: You only sell unleaded fuel. Considering there are very few cars that still even use the old standard fuel, and the benefit for the environment, it's a winning choice.
description.ES: You sell unleaded fuel only. Considering there are very few cars that uses the old standard fuel and the environmental needs, it's a winning choice.
description.FR: Vous vendez uniquement de l'essence sans plomb. Si l'on considère que très peu de voitures utilisent les anciens carburants et compte tenu des préoccupations environnementales, le choix est des plus judicieux.
description.DE: Sie verkaufen nur bleifreies Benzin. Da nur wenige Autos, das alte Standardbenzin benutzen und die Umwelt geschont wird, ist es eine profitable Strategie.
description.IT: Vendi solo benzina senza piombo. Considerando i vantaggi ambientali e il fatto che sono pochissime le auto che usano i vecchi tipi di carburante, la scelta si rivela vincente.

description.EN: As soon as a customer enters the station, he or she leaves the car with an employee who takes care of refilling the vehicle. In the meanwhile, the customer waits in a comfortable room.
description.ES: As soon as a customer enters the station, he leaves the car with a employee. He takes care of the refilling while the client waits in a comfortable room.
description.FR: Dès qu'un client arrive dans la station, il laisse sa voiture à un employé qui fait le plein pendant que le client patiente dans une pièce confortable.
description.DE: Sobald ein Kunde zum Tanken kommt, übernimmt ein Angestellter den Wagen und tankt ihn voll. Der Kunde wartet solange in einem bequemen Raum.
description.IT: Quando il cliente entra nella stazione di servizio, si reca in una confortevole sala d'attesa e affida la sua auto a un addetto che si occupa del rifornimento.
